name: Fattoush Salad
description: Lebanese bread salad with crispy pita, fresh vegetables and tangy sumac dressing.

instructions.instruction: Tear pita into small pieces, toast at 180Â°C or in a pan until crispy.
Make dressing: whisk olive oil, lemon juice, pomegranate molasses, garlic, sumac and salt.
Combine lettuce, tomatoes, cucumber, radishes and green onions in a large bowl.
Top with crispy pita pieces and serve immediately.
instructions.tip: Add pita last to keep it crispy.

tips: Sumac is essential - don't skip it.
Pita must stay crispy - add just before serving.
Pomegranate molasses found in Middle Eastern grocers.
storageInfo: Store vegetables and dressing separately for 1 day. Keep crispy bread apart.
servingSuggestion: Serve as a side or light lunch.
variations: Add figs for an autumn version.
